Uses of Interface
microsim.event.Event

  • Packages that use Event 
    Package Description
    microsim.event  

    • Uses of Event in microsim.event

      Classes in microsim.event that implement Event 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractEvent 
      class  CollectionTargetEvent
      It is able to inform all elements within a collection about an event.
      class  EventGroup
      A special implementation of the SimEvent familiy.
      class  SingleTargetEvent
      The simpler implementation of SimEvent class.
      class  SystemEvent
      System events are directly processed by the simulation engine.
      Methods in microsim.event that return Event 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Event[] EventGroup.eventsToArray()
      Return an sorted array of the added events.
      Event[] EventList.getEventArray()
      Return event list as array of Object.

      java.util.List<Event> EventGroup.getActions() 
      Methods in microsim.event with parameters of type Event 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      EventGroup EventGroup.addEvent(Event newEvent)
      Add an event to the list.
      int AbstractEvent.compareTo(Event e)
      Determines the natural ordering of events.
      void EventGroup.removeEvent(Event event)
      Remove the given event from the list.
      EventList EventList.schedule(Event event, double atTime)
      Deprecated. 
      EventList EventList.schedule(Event event, double atTime, double timeBetweenEvents)
      Deprecated. 
      EventList EventList.scheduleOnce(Event event, double atTime, int withOrdering)
      Schedule a generic event to occur at a given time.
      EventList EventList.scheduleRepeat(Event event, double atTime, int withOrdering, double timeBetweenEvents)
      Schedule a generic looped event at a given time and ordering.
      void EventList.unschedule(Event event)
      Remove from event list the given event.
